title: Is there a way to get a refund token?
body: i accidentally bought star guardian lux instead of silverfang akali

replies.body: Heya, sorry to hear about the accidental purchase.  ><  Technically, there's no way to get more refund tokens but we do like to look at each case individually if you'd like to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Maybe we can find some options for ya!
